author: Opinion by Charlie Dent
title: Opinion: My coronavirus recovery mistake was watching 'Tiger King'
description: My Covid-19 survival story is probably similar to those of a lot of other people who didn't experience the worst of the disease. It was early April when my test -- which I only took after my daughter Kate, a second-year medical school student, diagnosed me in…
content:
Republican Charlie Dent is a former US congressman from Pennsylvania who served as chairman of the House Ethics Committee from 2015 until 2016. The views expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion at CNN.
